 About - $PMAS
Deep in the abyss of the memesphere lived a small, happy, and compassionate
Pepe called $PMAS. With his calm and gentle demeanour, dishevelled beard, and
red coat, he donned on a journey to spread the festive cheer this holiday.

On his long and arduous path, he touched upon every community in his wake.
Each step filled another heart with love. His journey was long and almost
never-ending, yet he relents each and every Christmas. So at the end of the
night, when the lights go out, the sheets tucked in, he whispers, “Happy Pepe
Christmas to all, and a memeful night.”

 TOKENOMICS - $PMAS utilizes a 2% buy and sell tax, our Liquidity is LOCKED and our Contract
is RENOUNCED to ensure the absolute safest environment for YOU.

 2% - BUY TAX

 LP - LOCKED

 CA - RENOUNCED

 2% - BUY TAX

 How to Buy - PEPE CHRISTMAS!

  Install MetaMask

Download and install metamask on the appstore, or, alternatively if you're on
desktop download and install the browser extension.

  Deposit $ETH / Ethereum

Deposit ETHEREUM into your MetaMask wallet address to start with funds ready
to buy $PMAS.

  Swap For $PMAS

Visit Uniswap, sushiswap or any other decentralized exchange and paste the
$PMAS address to buy.

  Add $PMAS To Your Wallet!

Well Done! You've now joined $PMAS his journey to conquer! just add $PMAS to
your wallet to track and you're ready to go.
